summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub with Organic Marula Essential Oil, Moisturizes and Nourishes Face & Skin - 12.3 Oz Review Date: 2019/10/11 Store: Natural Solution Product Description: ['Natural Solution Organic Marula Oil Body Scrub Exfoliate and nourish your skin with this luxurious Natural Solution body scrub made with organic marula oil. Marula oil is a natural oil & is known for its ability to moisturize and protect the skin, as well as to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. This body scrub is also made with Himalayan pink salt, which is a natural exfoliator that helps to remove dead skin cells and leave your skin feeling smooth and soft. The scrub is gentle enough for daily use, and it is perfect for all skin types. Usage: Apply a generous amount of scrub to wet skin. Massage in circular motions for 2-3 minutes. Rinse with water. Use 2 times per week for best results. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. Benefits: 1- Exfoliates and removes dead skin cells 2- Moisturizes and nourishes the skin 3- Protects the skin from free radicals 4- Leaves skin feeling smooth and soft 5-Suitable for all skin types'] Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.75 x 3.75 x 3.6 inches; 12.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8246E', 'UPC': '818581019775', 'Manufacturer': 'Natural Solution'} Review Text: Nice scrub with a pleasant scent. Easy to use, extremely gentle, and I was using on one side only so I can see a difference after about 3 or 4 uses. Feels good, works well and no bad after effects, what more do you need? Review Title: Nice scrub. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Gnker Cellulite Remover Massager Brush Hair Mask 5 Seconds to Restore Soft Deep Conditioner Magical Hair Treatment Mask for Dry Damaged Review Date: 2020/10/23 Store: Gnker Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 3.8 x 2.7 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Gnker'} Review Text: Once I got comfortable using this, the hand part felt weird at first, I've seen decent results. I do use a cellulite gel and this brush and I can really see an improvement. I used the same combination a couple years ago and was very happy with my results but I fell by the wayside - I'm back and I'll continue to use it forever. Between the gel and the brush, the action of using the brush is the most important and I noticed results after a couple of weeks. Review Title: It Works! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Face Lift Tapes for Instant Face, Neck and Eye Lift Kit Tape Review Date: 2020/11/26 Store: C CRYSTAL LEMON Average Rating: 2.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'C CRYSTAL LEMON', 'Unit Count': '40.00 Count', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 3.35 x 0.87 inches; 0.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '725330346603'} Review Text: There are a number of this type of product on the market and this one does not compare favorably to any others that I’ve tried. They don’t hold well and I didn’t notice any improvement. I’ll keep shopping. Review Title: Not impressed. Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mens Sea Facial Detox Facial Mask Sheet for Oily Skin- New Skincare - Blackhead, Pore Cleansing, Peel-off (Age under 35) Review Date: 2021/01/02 Store: SeptCity Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SeptCity', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Detoxifying', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '7.09 x 5.51 x 0.79 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '733424600616'} Review Text: I wasn't really sure about this and when I first opened it I became even more skeptical. It looked like a paper towel and I had to wet it? Fortunately I thought ahead and opened it before soaking it in water and it was relatively easy to handle. I didn't love wearing it for 30 minutes, I got annoyed by then with the masque but 20 minutes was about my limit and I did see results. I liked the masque overall and it seemed to improve the tone and texture of my skin. I knocked off a point because it was a bit cumbersome to use and waiting around for 30 minutes seemed too much for me. I've got very sensitive skin and this was not of problem for me to use (although I did patch test first). If you know what you are going into (the time and effort) I'd recommend this product. If you don't have the time or want to bother with soaking the masque first, try something else but this does work! Review Title: Wasn't sure but was surprisingly effective Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Jade Roller Microneedle Derma Roller 3 in 1 for Face Massager Tools Set, Beautlinks Real Natural Rose Quartz for Anti Aging Relaxing Eye Puffiness Wrinkles for Face Eyes Neck Body Review Date: 2021/01/02 Store: Beautlinks Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.85 x 6.3 x 1.73 inches; 10.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '741376342409', 'Manufacturer': 'Beautlinks'} Review Text: I've been watching as every personality is raving about rose quartz and jade and microneedling etc. I did some research (from reputable sources) and there is actually some science to the use of these products. The microneedle blade is small enough for use. It makes little tiny, non-noticeable holes in the surface of your skin (in effect damaging it) so it will produce more collagen. While I wouldn't use it more than once a week, and just until my skin starts to get red, it does appear that my skin is softer and smoother after the treatment. So I'm find on the micro-needler. (Just remember gently, gently). The quartz roller is supposed to reduce redness, smooth the surface of the skin and help with lymphatic drainage. I'm not sure it actually does all that but it does feel nice and has definitely helped with under eye puffiness so it appears to be working. I'm very pleasantly surprised by the effectiveness of these devices and will continue to use them.

The packaging is fine and makes them giftable but I'm not sure the quality of the pieces will actually hold up. I've been using them for several months and so far so good but if they do fall apart, I'm willing to invest in more expensive products. For a starter set, I would give this a try to be sure it works for you (and you are willing to do it). Review Title: Effective Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Charyeah Bath Pillow Bathtub Spa Pillow With Powerful Gripping Suctions, Comfortable and Soft 2-Panel Cushions for Head, Neck, Back and Shoulder Support,Fits Hot Tub, Jacuzzi, Spas Review Date: 2021/01/19 Store: Charyeah Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '14.33 x 12.28 x 2.2 inches; 9.95 Ounces', 'UPC': '787937393473'} Review Text: I had a bit of trouble in the beginning getting this set exactly right for me but once it was set up (and I marked the spots the suction cups go onto) it's been a wonder. No more sore neck while soaking. I was worried about it staying damp but it doesn't. I do remove it when I'm not relaxing but it fits very nicely in my linen closet so it's only a second away. Review Title: If you really want to relax Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Aloe Vera Gel 100% Natural Moisturisers - Pure Organic Fresh Soothing Aloe-Vera Moisturizing Gel Skin Hair, Aloe Leaf Wash-free Clean After Sun Face Body (8.8 oz) Review Date: 2021/01/24 Store: CIMIY Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'CIMIY', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Unit Count': '8.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 1.57 x 1.57 inches; 11.22 Ounces'} Review Text: This is a great Aloe Gel. I keep in the fridge and use it regularly. It’s light enough weight that it doesn’t feel goopy and washes off clean. Very thick, nice and cold from the fridge and it’s great for too much sun or too much kitchen (burns, cuts, grease spatters, etc.). Easy to use - no nasty smell and works. Review Title: Nice and washes clean Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Nail Files 16 Pcs, Double Sided Emery Board Manicure Tools for Filing Natural Gel and Acrylic Nails for Home and Salon Use Review Date: 2021/02/12 Store: Keiby Citom Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Keiby Citom', 'Grit Number': '100', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 5.08 x 0.59 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '742025065137', 'Manufacturer': 'YHIT'} Review Text: These work okay on natural nails but they don't seem to last as long as some of my older ones that are still in use years later. I generally only use them to touch up rough edges or file down broken nails but I couldn't swear to their durability. I can't imagine them working well on acrylics or gels but since I'm not using either right now I can only attest to the fact that they are working on my natural nails and seem to work okay I'm just not sure about their durability. Review Title: They work ok on natural nails Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Shower Cap – 2 pcs Large Shower Cap – 15 inch Extra Large Shower Cap for Women – Waterproof Polyester Design with Inner Satin Layer - Adjustable Shower Cap with Buckle and Tightening Belt Review Date: 2021/07/18 Store: Dusjhet Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Dusjhet', 'Color': 'Red, Purple, Black', 'Material': 'Polyester', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Pattern': 'Solid', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '13 x 9 x 1.9 inches; 7.37 Ounces', 'UPC': '192236766284'} Review Text: I’ve been looking for a shower cap for a long time that is sturdy, the right size and doesn’t wear out after a few uses. This is promising although it’s bigger than I need/want - I’ll still use it until something better comes along. It is adjustable so it’s very usable just way oversized for my head and the amount of hair I have. It is lightweight and water proof and dries quickly so other than size, it’s great. Review Title: Bigger than I expected Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Spray Bottle with Adjustable Nozzle, Suream 10.6oz/300ml Green Mist Sprayer with Stream for Curly Hair, Refillable Empty Plastic Bottle for Hairdressing, Planting, Ironing and Cleaning Review Date: 2021/08/26 Store: SUREAM Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 4.49 x 3.07 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '735632989217'} Review Text: I’m using this for my body oil and it’s working perfectly. I wasn’t sure it would go through the sprayer but it does and it makes it so much easier to use. It’s a bit messy getting it started (oil you know) but once I got it primed, it’s working fine and I can spray when I finish in the shower and reach my back without help. Review Title: Body Mist Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: HWASHIN 12 Pack 3.4oz/100ml Clear Plastic Spray Bottles with White Fine Mist Sprayers for Essential Oils, Perfumes & Aromatherapy (Brush, Funnels, Droppers, Labels & 30ml Measuring Cup Included) Review Date: 2021/08/30 Store: HWASHIN Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'HWASHIN', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '100 Milliliters', 'Number of Items': '12', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '12.72 x 7.91 x 3.5 inches; 10.05 Ounces'} Review Text: I travel a lot and find that using a mister for a lot of things makes it easier. The problem has always been that the bottles leak or don't mist. These work perfectly and don't leak! Review Title: Easy to use and the mister works Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Makeup Brushes 12PCs- CLOWII Professional Premium Birch Handle Makeup Brush Foundation Concealer Brush Set of 12 with 1 Makeup Cleaner(Black) Review Date: 2021/12/08 Store: CLOWII Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'CLOWII', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'For Concealing, For Foundation', 'Material': 'Silicone, Wool', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '12', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Handle Material': 'Silicone', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '8.03 x 4.41 x 1.69 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '741818684043'} Review Text: I got these to add to my travel bag so I don't have to keep taking my regular brushes in and out. These are good quality brushes, are soft and smooth and I didn't have any stray bristles anywhere. Overall very satisfactory. I'm happy I got them, they are getting used frequently and it certainly saves time to have 2 sets. Review Title: Decent Quality - Nice Feel Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: WIS Hyaluronic Acid Facial Masks for Women Anti Aging, Moisturizing for All Skin Type 24 Pcs Sheet Mask, Daily Skin Care Review Date: 2021/12/08 Store: +WIS+ Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': '+WIS+', 'Item Form': 'Mask', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Hyaluronic Acid', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '6.18 x 5.04 x 4.13 inches; 1.83 Pounds'} Review Text: I really liked using these. They seemed to have a really good effect, without irritating my very sensitive skin. I'm always worried when I try something new -- I get redness, irritation and in bad cases hives so trying anything is a risk. I had absolutely NO problems with these and they left my skin feeling soft and supple and well moisturized. Review Title: Very nice! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Automatic Curling Iron, Rechargeable Cordless Hair Curler with LCD Digital Display and 6 Temperature Settings, Fast Heating Portable Automatic Hair Curler for Styling Hair Anytime ( Pink ) Review Date: 2022/08/04 Store: LUZZAM Average Rating: 2.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'LUZZAM', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Color': 'Pink', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 1.97 x 7.48 inches; 15.2 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'LUZZAM'} Review Text: While I love the idea of this, the actual product just isn't there yet. The charge didn't last long enough to get my hair done (I do have long and thick hair) so YMMV but the second time I tried to use it, it seems that the charge didn't even last as long as the first. Too much trouble for me. I was hoping for a true rechargeable product which would be excellent--if only this one delivered. Review Title: Great idea, less than stellar delivery. Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: JASSINS Face Highlight Stick, JASSINS 3D Dual Contour Stick, Shimmer Cream Powder, 2-in-1 Facial Brightens & Shades Foundation Concealer Review Date: 2022/11/22 Store: JASSINS Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Coverage': 'Light', 'Brand': 'JASSINS', 'Skin Tone': 'All'} Review Text: Easy to use and blends well. The dark color was a little darker than I would have liked but that's a color issue. The lighter color works well. Does the job. Review Title: Does a good job. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Simply Dana Rivitastore Neck Firming Cream — Skin Firming Cream for Tightening Neck, Jawline, and Chest, Collagen Peptides, and Squalane Cream for Wrinkles, Sagging, and Dryness Review Date: 2022/11/27 Store: Simply Dana Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Simply Dana', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Product Dimensions': '1 x 1 x 4 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} Review Text: Seems to work but my neck definitely needs more help than I'll get from a cream. Moisturizes well and absorbs nicely. My sensitive skin didn't have any trouble. I did notice some improvement but it doesn't last through the day. Review Title: Good moisturizer/firmer Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub with Organic Marula Essential Oil, Moisturizes and Nourishes Face & Skin - 12.3 Oz Review Date: 2019/10/11 Store: Natural Solution Product Description: ['Natural Solution Organic Marula Oil Body Scrub Exfoliate and nourish your skin with this luxurious Natural Solution body scrub made with organic marula oil. Marula oil is a natural oil & is known for its ability to moisturize and protect the skin, as well as to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. This body scrub is also made with Himalayan pink salt, which is a natural exfoliator that helps to remove dead skin cells and leave your skin feeling smooth and soft. The scrub is gentle enough for daily use, and it is perfect for all skin types. Usage: Apply a generous amount of scrub to wet skin. Massage in circular motions for 2-3 minutes. Rinse with water. Use 2 times per week for best results. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. Benefits: 1- Exfoliates and removes dead skin cells 2- Moisturizes and nourishes the skin 3- Protects the skin from free radicals 4- Leaves skin feeling smooth and soft 5-Suitable for all skin types'] Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.75 x 3.75 x 3.6 inches; 12.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8246E', 'UPC': '818581019775', 'Manufacturer': 'Natural Solution'} Review Text: Nice scrub with a pleasant scent. Easy to use, extremely gentle, and I was using on one side only so I can see a difference after about 3 or 4 uses. Feels good, works well and no bad after effects, what more do you need? Review Title: Nice scrub. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Gnker Cellulite Remover Massager Brush Hair Mask 5 Seconds to Restore Soft Deep Conditioner Magical Hair Treatment Mask for Dry Damaged Review Date: 2020/10/23 Store: Gnker Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 3.8 x 2.7 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Gnker'} Review Text: Once I got comfortable using this, the hand part felt weird at first, I've seen decent results. I do use a cellulite gel and this brush and I can really see an improvement. I used the same combination a couple years ago and was very happy with my results but I fell by the wayside - I'm back and I'll continue to use it forever. Between the gel and the brush, the action of using the brush is the most important and I noticed results after a couple of weeks. Review Title: It Works! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Face Lift Tapes for Instant Face, Neck and Eye Lift Kit Tape Review Date: 2020/11/26 Store: C CRYSTAL LEMON Average Rating: 2.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'C CRYSTAL LEMON', 'Unit Count': '40.00 Count', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 3.35 x 0.87 inches; 0.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '725330346603'} Review Text: There are a number of this type of product on the market and this one does not compare favorably to any others that I’ve tried. They don’t hold well and I didn’t notice any improvement. I’ll keep shopping. Review Title: Not impressed. Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mens Sea Facial Detox Facial Mask Sheet for Oily Skin- New Skincare - Blackhead, Pore Cleansing, Peel-off (Age under 35) Review Date: 2021/01/02 Store: SeptCity Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SeptCity', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Detoxifying', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '7.09 x 5.51 x 0.79 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '733424600616'} Review Text: I wasn't really sure about this and when I first opened it I became even more skeptical. It looked like a paper towel and I had to wet it? Fortunately I thought ahead and opened it before soaking it in water and it was relatively easy to handle. I didn't love wearing it for 30 minutes, I got annoyed by then with the masque but 20 minutes was about my limit and I did see results. I liked the masque overall and it seemed to improve the tone and texture of my skin. I knocked off a point because it was a bit cumbersome to use and waiting around for 30 minutes seemed too much for me. I've got very sensitive skin and this was not of problem for me to use (although I did patch test first). If you know what you are going into (the time and effort) I'd recommend this product. If you don't have the time or want to bother with soaking the masque first, try something else but this does work! Review Title: Wasn't sure but was surprisingly effective Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Jade Roller Microneedle Derma Roller 3 in 1 for Face Massager Tools Set, Beautlinks Real Natural Rose Quartz for Anti Aging Relaxing Eye Puffiness Wrinkles for Face Eyes Neck Body Review Date: 2021/01/02 Store: Beautlinks Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.85 x 6.3 x 1.73 inches; 10.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '741376342409', 'Manufacturer': 'Beautlinks'} Review Text: I've been watching as every personality is raving about rose quartz and jade and microneedling etc. I did some research (from reputable sources) and there is actually some science to the use of these products. The microneedle blade is small enough for use. It makes little tiny, non-noticeable holes in the surface of your skin (in effect damaging it) so it will produce more collagen. While I wouldn't use it more than once a week, and just until my skin starts to get red, it does appear that my skin is softer and smoother after the treatment. So I'm find on the micro-needler. (Just remember gently, gently). The quartz roller is supposed to reduce redness, smooth the surface of the skin and help with lymphatic drainage. I'm not sure it actually does all that but it does feel nice and has definitely helped with under eye puffiness so it appears to be working. I'm very pleasantly surprised by the effectiveness of these devices and will continue to use them.

The packaging is fine and makes them giftable but I'm not sure the quality of the pieces will actually hold up. I've been using them for several months and so far so good but if they do fall apart, I'm willing to invest in more expensive products. For a starter set, I would give this a try to be sure it works for you (and you are willing to do it). Review Title: Effective Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Charyeah Bath Pillow Bathtub Spa Pillow With Powerful Gripping Suctions, Comfortable and Soft 2-Panel Cushions for Head, Neck, Back and Shoulder Support,Fits Hot Tub, Jacuzzi, Spas Review Date: 2021/01/19 Store: Charyeah Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '14.33 x 12.28 x 2.2 inches; 9.95 Ounces', 'UPC': '787937393473'} Review Text: I had a bit of trouble in the beginning getting this set exactly right for me but once it was set up (and I marked the spots the suction cups go onto) it's been a wonder. No more sore neck while soaking. I was worried about it staying damp but it doesn't. I do remove it when I'm not relaxing but it fits very nicely in my linen closet so it's only a second away. Review Title: If you really want to relax Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Aloe Vera Gel 100% Natural Moisturisers - Pure Organic Fresh Soothing Aloe-Vera Moisturizing Gel Skin Hair, Aloe Leaf Wash-free Clean After Sun Face Body (8.8 oz) Review Date: 2021/01/24 Store: CIMIY Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'CIMIY', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Unit Count': '8.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 1.57 x 1.57 inches; 11.22 Ounces'} Review Text: This is a great Aloe Gel. I keep in the fridge and use it regularly. It’s light enough weight that it doesn’t feel goopy and washes off clean. Very thick, nice and cold from the fridge and it’s great for too much sun or too much kitchen (burns, cuts, grease spatters, etc.). Easy to use - no nasty smell and works. Review Title: Nice and washes clean Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Nail Files 16 Pcs, Double Sided Emery Board Manicure Tools for Filing Natural Gel and Acrylic Nails for Home and Salon Use Review Date: 2021/02/12 Store: Keiby Citom Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Keiby Citom', 'Grit Number': '100', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 5.08 x 0.59 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '742025065137', 'Manufacturer': 'YHIT'} Review Text: These work okay on natural nails but they don't seem to last as long as some of my older ones that are still in use years later. I generally only use them to touch up rough edges or file down broken nails but I couldn't swear to their durability. I can't imagine them working well on acrylics or gels but since I'm not using either right now I can only attest to the fact that they are working on my natural nails and seem to work okay I'm just not sure about their durability. Review Title: They work ok on natural nails Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Shower Cap – 2 pcs Large Shower Cap – 15 inch Extra Large Shower Cap for Women – Waterproof Polyester Design with Inner Satin Layer - Adjustable Shower Cap with Buckle and Tightening Belt Review Date: 2021/07/18 Store: Dusjhet Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Dusjhet', 'Color': 'Red, Purple, Black', 'Material': 'Polyester', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Pattern': 'Solid', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '13 x 9 x 1.9 inches; 7.37 Ounces', 'UPC': '192236766284'} Review Text: I’ve been looking for a shower cap for a long time that is sturdy, the right size and doesn’t wear out after a few uses. This is promising although it’s bigger than I need/want - I’ll still use it until something better comes along. It is adjustable so it’s very usable just way oversized for my head and the amount of hair I have. It is lightweight and water proof and dries quickly so other than size, it’s great. Review Title: Bigger than I expected Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Spray Bottle with Adjustable Nozzle, Suream 10.6oz/300ml Green Mist Sprayer with Stream for Curly Hair, Refillable Empty Plastic Bottle for Hairdressing, Planting, Ironing and Cleaning Review Date: 2021/08/26 Store: SUREAM Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 4.49 x 3.07 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '735632989217'} Review Text: I’m using this for my body oil and it’s working perfectly. I wasn’t sure it would go through the sprayer but it does and it makes it so much easier to use. It’s a bit messy getting it started (oil you know) but once I got it primed, it’s working fine and I can spray when I finish in the shower and reach my back without help. Review Title: Body Mist Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: HWASHIN 12 Pack 3.4oz/100ml Clear Plastic Spray Bottles with White Fine Mist Sprayers for Essential Oils, Perfumes & Aromatherapy (Brush, Funnels, Droppers, Labels & 30ml Measuring Cup Included) Review Date: 2021/08/30 Store: HWASHIN Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'HWASHIN', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '100 Milliliters', 'Number of Items': '12', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '12.72 x 7.91 x 3.5 inches; 10.05 Ounces'} Review Text: I travel a lot and find that using a mister for a lot of things makes it easier. The problem has always been that the bottles leak or don't mist. These work perfectly and don't leak! Review Title: Easy to use and the mister works Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Makeup Brushes 12PCs- CLOWII Professional Premium Birch Handle Makeup Brush Foundation Concealer Brush Set of 12 with 1 Makeup Cleaner(Black) Review Date: 2021/12/08 Store: CLOWII Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'CLOWII', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'For Concealing, For Foundation', 'Material': 'Silicone, Wool', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '12', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Handle Material': 'Silicone', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '8.03 x 4.41 x 1.69 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '741818684043'} Review Text: I got these to add to my travel bag so I don't have to keep taking my regular brushes in and out. These are good quality brushes, are soft and smooth and I didn't have any stray bristles anywhere. Overall very satisfactory. I'm happy I got them, they are getting used frequently and it certainly saves time to have 2 sets. Review Title: Decent Quality - Nice Feel Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: WIS Hyaluronic Acid Facial Masks for Women Anti Aging, Moisturizing for All Skin Type 24 Pcs Sheet Mask, Daily Skin Care Review Date: 2021/12/08 Store: +WIS+ Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': '+WIS+', 'Item Form': 'Mask', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Hyaluronic Acid', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '6.18 x 5.04 x 4.13 inches; 1.83 Pounds'} Review Text: I really liked using these. They seemed to have a really good effect, without irritating my very sensitive skin. I'm always worried when I try something new -- I get redness, irritation and in bad cases hives so trying anything is a risk. I had absolutely NO problems with these and they left my skin feeling soft and supple and well moisturized. Review Title: Very nice! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Automatic Curling Iron, Rechargeable Cordless Hair Curler with LCD Digital Display and 6 Temperature Settings, Fast Heating Portable Automatic Hair Curler for Styling Hair Anytime ( Pink ) Review Date: 2022/08/04 Store: LUZZAM Average Rating: 2.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'LUZZAM', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Color': 'Pink', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 1.97 x 7.48 inches; 15.2 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'LUZZAM'} Review Text: While I love the idea of this, the actual product just isn't there yet. The charge didn't last long enough to get my hair done (I do have long and thick hair) so YMMV but the second time I tried to use it, it seems that the charge didn't even last as long as the first. Too much trouble for me. I was hoping for a true rechargeable product which would be excellent--if only this one delivered. Review Title: Great idea, less than stellar delivery. Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: JASSINS Face Highlight Stick, JASSINS 3D Dual Contour Stick, Shimmer Cream Powder, 2-in-1 Facial Brightens & Shades Foundation Concealer Review Date: 2022/11/22 Store: JASSINS Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Coverage': 'Light', 'Brand': 'JASSINS', 'Skin Tone': 'All'} Review Text: Easy to use and blends well. The dark color was a little darker than I would have liked but that's a color issue. The lighter color works well. Does the job. Review Title: Does a good job. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Simply Dana Rivitastore Neck Firming Cream — Skin Firming Cream for Tightening Neck, Jawline, and Chest, Collagen Peptides, and Squalane Cream for Wrinkles, Sagging, and Dryness Review Date: 2022/11/27 Store: Simply Dana Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Simply Dana', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Product Dimensions': '1 x 1 x 4 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} Review Text: Seems to work but my neck definitely needs more help than I'll get from a cream. Moisturizes well and absorbs nicely. My sensitive skin didn't have any trouble. I did notice some improvement but it doesn't last through the day. Review Title: Good moisturizer/firmer Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
raw_response:
**Preferences and Patterns Summary:**

- **Skincare Focus:** Strong interest in body and facial skincare products, particularly those emphasizing natural, organic ingredients (e.g., oils, scrubs, masks).
- **Hydration and Moisturization:** Consistently purchases items that offer hydration benefits, such as body scrubs, aloe vera gel, and moisturizing masks.
- **Gentle Formulations:** Prefers gentle, non-irritating products suitable for sensitive skin, often seeking items without harsh chemicals.
- **Multi-Functional Products:** Shows a tendency toward products that serve multiple functions (e.g., exfoliation, moisturizing, anti-aging).
- **Natural Remedies:** A notable inclination for natural or organic therapies (e.g., Himalayan salt, marula oil, aloe vera).
- **Mixed Product Feedback:** Ratings indicate mixed experiences—positive outcomes with masks, scrubs, and tools, while expressing dissatisfaction with certain devices and ineffective products.
- **Hair Care Interest:** Engages with hair care, focusing on moisturizing treatments and tools, although some tools struggled to meet expectations.
- **Convenience:** Interested in products that enhance convenience (e.g., spray bottles for body oils).
- **Usage of Reviews:** Attentive to product efficiency and user-friendliness, often providing detailed feedback on usability and effectiveness.

This individual exhibits a clear pattern of prioritizing effective, gentle, and natural skincare solutions, while navigating some trial and error with various beauty tools and treatments.

target_interaction.title: Works on my super-sensitive skin
target_interaction.text: My skin is very sensitive so I'm always careful to patch test and then I still can have trouble but this worked fine. Loaded with serum, there is plenty to pat in when the mask comes off. As usual, I had a bit of trouble getting the mask in exactly the right place and had to fiddle with it a bit but once it's in place it stays.
target_interaction.title_meta: Cell Fusion C Low pH pHarrier Mask*10sheets | Intensive weak acid care for all skin types, Korean Face Mask
